title: The Miraculous Mellops 2. Part 2
creator_credit: Karl Zwicky, Posie Graeme-Evans, Film Australia and Millenium Pictures
brief_description: Jason’s icypole model of the Opera House looks a little sad, so the Mellops decide to use the WOOP to get pictures of the real one. Darren however has stolen the WOOP and taken it to Dump who has now converted his compund to a travel agency. The kids try to work out plans to regain the WOOP and manage to transport Dump into the path of a runaway bull. He has to take the long way home. Meanwhile the kids are receiving more holofaxes from the Grubs.
creator_credit_for_label: Karl Zwicky, Posie Graeme-Evans, Film Australia and Millenium Pictures
